numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that baseball players have little diversity.
2. I wonder why there are few coaches of color.
3. In the National Football League, the percentage of head coaches of color is 13 percent.
5. In my community, we do not see much diverse leadership.
6. The graph shows sports that have little diversity in skin color.
7. The graph shows sports that have little diversity in ethnicity.
8. The graph shows that there is little diverse leadership in sports.
9. The headline is: Sports with not much diversity in 2021.
